PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
_ZclRequestTunnelPayload_t Struct Reference

#include <zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t protocolId
uint16_t manufacturerCode
uint8_t flowControlSupport
uint16_t maximumIncomingTransferSize

Detailed Description

The request payload specifies the protocol identifier for the requested tunnel, a manufacturer code in case of proprietary protocols and the use of flow control for streaming protocols. See ZSE Profile Spec. r17, Figure D.38.

Definition at line 439 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t _ZclRequestTunnelPayload_t::protocolId

The identifier of the metering communication protocol for which the tunnel is requested.

See also:
ZclSeTunnelProtocolId_t.

Definition at line 443 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint16_t _ZclRequestTunnelPayload_t::manufacturerCode

A code that is allocated by the ZigBee Alliance, relating the manufacturer to a device and – for the tunneling - a manufacturer specific protocol. A value of 0xFFFF indicates that the Manufacturer Code is not used.

Definition at line 447 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint8_t _ZclRequestTunnelPayload_t::flowControlSupport

A boolean type parameter that indicates whether flow control support is requested from the tunnel (0x01) or not (0x00).

Definition at line 450 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint16_t _ZclRequestTunnelPayload_t::maximumIncomingTransferSize

A value that defines the size, in octets, of the maximum data packet that can be transferred to the client in the payload of a single TransferData command.

Definition at line 454 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.
